metadata.Title: CVE-2021-31239 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: An issue found in SQLite SQLite3 v.3.35.4 that allows a remote attacker to cause a denial of service via the appendvfs.c function.

notes.Note: rodrigo-zaiden> appendvfs extension was added in version 3.22 (check-in https://www.sqlite.org/src/info/063a03a3) and the issue was likely introduced in version 3.35.2 (check-in https://www.sqlite.org/src/info/25c3186a).

criterions.comment: sqlite: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
